Uses of Interface
com.interface21.ui.context.ThemeSource

Packages that use ThemeSource
com.interface21.ui.context Contains classes defining the application context subinterface for UI applications.  
com.interface21.ui.context.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.ui.context package.  
com.interface21.web.context Contains the application context subinterface for web applications, and the ContextLoaderListener that bootstraps the root web application context. 
com.interface21.web.context.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.web.context package, such as WebApplicationContext implementations, and a utility class for retrieval of the root application context etc. 
 

Uses of ThemeSource in com.interface21.ui.context
 

Subinterfaces of ThemeSource in com.interface21.ui.context
 interface NestingThemeSource
          Subinterface of ThemeSource to be implemented by objects that can resolve messages hierarchically.
 

Methods in com.interface21.ui.context with parameters of type ThemeSource
 void NestingThemeSource.setParent(ThemeSource parent)
          Set the parent that will be used to try to resolve theme messages that this object can't resolve.

          Adds theme capabilities for UI contexts.
 class ResourceBundleThemeSource
          ThemeSource implementation that looks up an individual ResourceBundle per theme.
 class StaticUiApplicationContext
          Adds theme capabilities for UI contexts.
